about_the_game:
WHEN HORROR MEETS URBEX!

Forsake is a 1 to 4 player co-op online survival horror game where each player is a member of an urban explorer group.
Enter one of the 6 prohibited places and explore them to exorcise one of the 7 entities that lurk and hunt you down, at the cost of your life.

Explore, loot and complete missions!


- Alone or in a group, enter haunted locations to explore every inch of them by opening closed areas with hidden codes, secret mechanisms and keys!

- Loot to earn money and buy equipment to help you to survive on your next exploration!

- Exorcise the place and complete bonus missions to gain experience and unlock content such as new maps and powerfull skills!

BE CAREFUL, THE ENTITIES THAT GUARD THE PLACE WILL BE YOUR WORST NIGHTMARE AND WILL HAVE ONLY ONE DESIRE: YOUR DEATH.
Escape at any time during an exploration to bring back your loot and come back later better equipped to face the entities!

Forsake offers:


- Intense survival experience
You are the prey, and you have two ways to complete your exploration without being killed:
1. Be stealthy and explore places where entities wander without being detected.
2. Survive, using your equipment and flashing lightsticks.

- Great replayability
Parts of each map, items and loot are randomly generated to create many variations of the same location.
A progression and difficulty system will help you spice up your explorations!

- Entities with unique behaviors
Locations are protected by entities, and each one has its own unique behavior. Get to know their particularities to better exorcise them!
Complete the bestiary by meeting all of them and fulfilling specific objectives.

- Your equipment, your perks, your gameplay
Choose up to 3 pieces of urbex equipment to go exploring: avoid attracting attention, get some intels and so on.
Unlock and choose special perks in the skills tree. Will you focus on speed, strength or technique?

- Missions and exploration
Complete the main mission, bonus missions, or just grind explorations to upgrade your inventory. One step back two steps forward.

- Proximity voice chat for total immersion
Talk directly in-game with your exploration group to live the horrific experience at 100%!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Forsake is a 1 to 4 player co-op online survival horror game where each player is a member of an urban explorer group. Choose your equipment to explore places full of paranormal and exorcise them, if you think you can handle it!
